text: yi baxaw ku Rabbi ama soono koo kah yuybulle innaah nubuwwannuh koo doorele, sinam table soonoona elle tafdige inna koo barsele, Yalli nubuwwanni niqmat koo kee Nabii Yaq-qhuub samadah duudusele, tahak duma ku namma abba Nabii Ibraahim kee Nabii iscaaqhah nubuwwanni niqmat keenih kah duuduse innah, diggah ku Rabbi isi naqoosak nubuwwannuh doora mara yaaxigi, usuk naggaaraay kullim laaracat haa Rabbi kinni kaak iyye
